backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles with access control and a public contact form storing messages retrievable only by admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and functionality of various frontend React components and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, light/dark themes, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the LandingPage.
frontend/src/components/landing/AboutSec: About section displaying institute image and descriptive text in a two‑column layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactA: Address and map component showing location details and an embedded Google Maps iframe.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Contact form with validation, backend submission, success feedback, and a side‑by‑side address/map layout.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer with current year, branding, and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/landing/GalleryS: Polished 9‑image training environment gallery with hover effects, overlays, and numbered badges.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Renders the landing page hero with title, description, and a CTA button. Uses gradient styling and centers content responsively.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingS: Implements an auto-advancing image slider with fade transitions, navigation arrows, and dot indicators. Uses responsive aspect ratios for full-width display.
frontend/src/components/landing/landingT: Exports shared CSS class name constants for layout, typography, and card styles. Centralizes theme values for landing components.
frontend/src/components/landing/Navbar.t: Provides a responsive navbar with scroll-based styling, desktop and mobile menus, and navigation links. Includes a mobile toggle and CTA button.
frontend/src/components/landing/ScrollTo: Listens for URL hash changes and smoothly scrolls to matching page sections. Runs once on load and updates on hashchange events.
frontend/src/components/landing/Services: Displays a grid of service cards with icons, titles, and descriptions. Includes hover effects and themed styling.
frontend/src/components/landing/StudentR: Shows a grid of student review cards with quotes, photos, and locations. Uses shared styling from landing theme.
frontend/src/components/landing/Training: Renders a list of training programs in a styled grid using corporate-themed card components. Centers content within a padded section.
frontend/src/components/landing/WhatsApp: Adds a floating WhatsApp chat button linking to a preset number. Styled as a circular fixed-position action button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user’s identity using React Query. Reinitializes and invalidates queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient. Handles identity loading, login, logout, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting a contact message via an actor and invalidates the messages query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes and sets global styles for body, html, and borders.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query's QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the landing page layout including navbar, slider, sections, footer, and utility components like ScrollToHash.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radius, animations, and registering plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, new requests, image requirements, and state version info.
